response:
Here are 50 short story prompts in a Python list:

```python
short_story_prompts = [
    "A mysterious box is delivered to your doorstep with no return address.",
    "You wake up one morning to find that you have the ability to fly.",
    "A group of friends on a camping trip discover a hidden cave with ancient artifacts.",
    "In a world where time is currency, the rich live forever and the poor are left with nothing.",
    "You stumble upon a secret society that has been hiding in plain sight.",
    "A young couple's romantic getaway turns into a fight for survival when they become stranded on a deserted island.",
    "A detective is tasked with solving a murder that took place in a virtual reality world.",
    "A small town is plagued by a series of bizarre occurrences that seem to be connected to an old, abandoned factory.",
    "You are given the chance to go back in time and relive any day from your past.",
    "A group of strangers are trapped in an elevator and must work together to escape.",
    "A person with amnesia must navigate a complex web of memories that are not their own.",
    "In a world where memories can be transferred from one person to another, a black market for memories thrives.",
    "A scientist discovers a way to communicate with animals, but at a terrible cost.",
    "You are tasked with solving a puzzle that, if solved, will grant you immense power and wealth.",
    "A group of friends discover that their town is a simulation created by a more advanced civilization.",
    "A person is cursed to repeat the same day over and over again until they get it right.",
    "A detective is tasked with solving a series of murders that seem to be connected to an ancient myth.",
    "You are given the chance to switch lives with someone else for a day.",
    "A small town is invaded by an alien species that seems to have a strange fascination with human emotions.",
    "A person is trapped in a never-ending loop of dreams within dreams.",
    "A group of friends discover a hidden world within their own reflections.",
    "You are tasked with finding a way to stop a catastrophic event that will destroy the world in a matter of days.",
    "A scientist discovers a way to bring people back from the dead, but at a terrible cost.",
    "A person is tasked with navigating a maze that seems to shift and change every time they think they've found a way out.",
    "A group of strangers are brought together to participate in a mysterious game where the stakes are higher than they ever could have imagined.",
    "You are given the chance to travel to any point in history and meet anyone you want.",
    "A small town is plagued by a series of supernatural occurrences that seem to be connected to an old, abandoned mansion.",
    "A person is tasked with solving a mystery that involves a series of cryptic clues and puzzles.",
    "A group of friends discover that they have the ability to shape shift into any animal they want.",
    "You are trapped in a world where gravity doesn't exist and must find a way to survive.",
    "A scientist discovers a way to create a new species of human that is superior to the current one.",
    "A person is tasked with navigating a world where everything is opposite of what it seems.",
    "A group of strangers are brought together to participate in a social experiment that pushes them to their limits.",
    "You are given the chance to live forever, but at a terrible cost.",
    "A small town is invaded by a group of rogue robots that seem to have a mind of their own.",
    "A person is tasked with solving a mystery that involves a series of mysterious disappearances.",
    "A group of friends discover that they have the ability to time travel, but only within their own memories.",
    "You are trapped in a world where the laws of physics no longer apply.",
    "A scientist discovers a way to create a machine that can predict the future with perfect accuracy.",
    "A person is tasked with navigating a world where emotions are outlawed.",
    "A group of strangers are brought together to participate in a mysterious competition where the winner will receive a prize beyond their wildest dreams.",
    "You are given the chance to switch bodies with someone else for a day.",
    "A small town is plagued by a series of bizarre occurrences that seem to be connected to an old, abandoned asylum.",
    "A person is tasked with solving a mystery that involves a series of cryptic messages and codes.",
    "A group of friends discover that they have the ability to control the elements.",
    "You are trapped in a world where the sky is always dark and the sun never rises.",
    "A scientist discovers a way to create a new form of sustainable energy that could change the world.",
    "A person is tasked with navigating a world where technology has surpassed human intelligence.",
    "A group of strangers are brought together to participate in a mysterious ritual that seems to have the power to grant wishes."
]
```

You can use these prompts to generate short stories by selecting a prompt from the list and using it as inspiration for your writing. You can also use Python's `random` module to select a prompt at random, like this:

```python
import random

prompt = random.choice(short_story_prompts)
print(prompt)
```
